text: I ve written my note and sealed it in blackI m sorry  I don t know what to do anymore  All I feel like I m doing is pushing the people I love away  Constantly misunderstood and I still can t get a diagnosis of autism  just pills and delayed or cancelled therapy appointments  I m so sorry for my family  the ones who I love the most and yet know the least about me   The girl I loved is gone  I ruined her  broke her down until she wasn t who she was anymore   All the texting  not even realising I was sending too many  I m so sorry   So I ve written the note  sealed it in black wax  Maybe one day I ll open it and throw the note away  but not today  I don t plan on opening this letter  But maybe someone else will  and they ll know that I loved them into my final moments on this earth  I wish I understood myself  the only person that ever fully understood I destroyed  Now it s just a sea of nothingness in a cloud of self hatred and pain   I have no tears left to cry  people leaving doesn t surprise me anymore  I wish I wasn t a burden  and yet here I am  Maybe not for much longer  it would be for the best  I hope she knows I love her  and she matters because all I want is for her to be the happiest person alive  I m sorry I could never provide that
